name: tournament_results_by_id_and_year_wta
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ultimate_tennis.
Tool description:  Welcome to the Ultimate Tennis API!  It provides all the information you need about the tennis world, including all the details related to players and tournaments(live scores, matches, statistics), from both the ATP and tha WTA circuits, both singles and doubles . We also provide live bettings odds for every match in every tennis category. You can easily build your tennis related portal or enhance your Ml/AI projects.   
API description: Via this endpoint, you can retrieve all the matches played in the selected tournament, in a given year. The results are added instantly for every match that ends. You can Retrieve the list of the IDs from the tournament list WTA endpoint.

year.description: Year to be selected. Please note that not all the tournaments have been played every year.

tournament_id.description: The ID of the tournament. You can retrieve this list from the WTA endpoint.
